lead_paragraph: After Sunday’s collapse against the Titans, few Giants escaped criticism from  Tom Coughlin.  But the coach has been oddly quiet about receiver Plaxico Burress, who has seemed to come up short on several key plays this season.
snippet: After Sunday’s collapse against the Titans, few Giants escaped criticism from  Tom Coughlin.  But the coach has been oddly quiet about receiver Plaxico Burress, who has seemed to come up short on several key plays this season.
